# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    current_line = ""
    wrapped_text = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_text *= current_line * "\n"
            current_line = word
        else
            if !isempty(current_line)
                current_line *= " " * word
            else
                current_line = word
            end
        end
    end
    
    wrapped_text *= current_line
    return wrapped_text
end

# Example
example_text = "Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for technical computing."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(example_text)
println(wrapped_text)
```
